quest.name: One Good Trick Deserves Another
journal:
 Quest Sync
The vengeful Nu Mou is bent on revenge.
objectives: Deliver the mock ancient texts to the pixies.
Report to the vengeful Nu Mou.

dialogue.name: ANGRYNUMOU03414
dialogue.text: Grrr, those accursed pixies! I never should've trusted them!

dialogue.name: ANGRYNUMOU03414
dialogue.text: I asked them for sheep's milk. They demanded their payment first, and against my better judgment, I gave it to them. I've not seen neither hide nor hair of them since!

dialogue.name: ANGRYNUMOU03414
dialogue.text: But they will rue the day they cheated this Nu Mou! I'll get my revenge─with your help, mortal!

dialogue.name: ANGRYNUMOU03414
dialogue.text: Your task is simple. Take these mock ancient texts I've prepared and give them to the pixies. The rest should play out by itself, and I will have my revenge─and you your fitting payment!

dialogue.name: ANGRYNUMOU03414
dialogue.text: And if the pixies think to ask where the texts come from, just say that you found it at the Church at Dammroen Field.

dialogue.name: ANGRYNUMOU03414
dialogue.text: Please find the cheating pixies and give them the mock ancient texts. The rest should play out by itself, and I will have my revenge─and you your fitting payment!

dialogue.name: EARHUSTLERPIXIEA03414
dialogue.text: Hm? You wish to give me something, you say?

dialogue.name: EARHUSTLERPIXIEA03414
dialogue.text: Ooh, it says here there's a secret flower garden! And the way will be revealed if one makes an offering of sheep's milk to the leafman north of here!

dialogue.name: EARHUSTLERPIXIEA03414
dialogue.text: Tee hee, I must go and tell everyone...right after I've had my fill of the garden!

dialogue.name: EARHUSTLERPIXIEB03414
dialogue.text: Well now, what's a mortal doing here?

dialogue.name: EARHUSTLERPIXIEB03414
dialogue.text: This was at the church? Let's see, now... <gasp> It tells you the way to get to a secret garden!

dialogue.name: EARHUSTLERPIXIEB03414
dialogue.text: All you need is sheep's milk, and it just so happens we have the extra we didn't give the Nu Mou! I'll go and test it out at once!

dialogue.name: ANGRYNUMOU03414
dialogue.text: You gave the pixies the texts, and they believed it? Hah hah hah! Such sweet revenge!

dialogue.name: ANGRYNUMOU03414
dialogue.text: Here, mortal─the fitting payment for your excellent service! Now, if you'll excuse me, I have sheep's milk to collect!
